channel.title: Undercover Nerd
channel.itunes:subtitle: Take a journey
channel.itunes:author: Scot
channel.itunes:summary: Hey there! I'm a big boy in a small world; join me and discover.
channel.description: Hey there! I'm a big boy in a small world; join me and discover.

item.title: Try and Change My Mind
item.itunes:summary:
Welcome to the first episode of Undercover Nerd! In this episode I talk about sorting ourselves into groups, and what makes it so difficult to change our minds on issues.
Shoot me an email at scot@undercovercast.com with your comments and questions!
Here are the links to the articles I mentioned:
Elizabeth Kolbert's article for the New Yorker Brian Resnick's article for Vox An article in the New York Times I used as reference material.
Enjoy the show!
